description:

description:
Are you ready toÂ elevate your Python engineering skills and transition into the exciting field ofÂ Machine Learning? EPAMÂ is offering aÂ unique opportunity where you can secure aÂ position after aÂ single technical interview and gain Machine Learning expertise without affecting your title orÂ compensation.

WeÂ are seeking aÂ Python Software Engineer toÂ participate inÂ aÂ retraining program focused onÂ advanced AIÂ applications. This role involves exploring the principles ofÂ machine learning, deploying MLÂ systems, and gaining hands-on experience with leading cloud platforms.

During the program you will: Familiarize yourself with machine learning principles, the evolution ofÂ AI, and practical applications ofÂ neural networks and Natural Language Processing (NLP), including Large Language Models like GPT. Focus onÂ deploying and operating cutting-edge MLÂ and AIÂ systems. Learn best practices for scaling models, managing data pipelines, and troubleshooting operational challenges. Gain hands-on experience with Databricks for system deployment and operations. Dive into deployment intricacies onÂ major cloud platforms: AWS, Azure, and GCP. Understand the MLE/MLOps practices used byÂ EPAM and the solutions weÂ offer toÂ our clients.

The remote option applies only toÂ the Candidates who will beÂ working from any location inÂ Ukraine.


#LI-DNI

Responsibilities

  • Familiarize yourself with machine learning principles, the evolution ofÂ AI, and practical applications ofÂ neural networks and Natural Language Processing (NLP), including Large Language Models like GPT
  • Focus onÂ deploying and operating cutting-edge MLÂ and AIÂ systems. Learn best practices for scaling models, managing data pipelines, and troubleshooting operational challenges
  • Gain hands-on experience with Databricks for system deployment and operations
  • Dive into deployment intricacies onÂ major cloud platforms: AWS, Azure, and GCP
  • Understand the MLE/MLOps practices used byÂ EPAM and the solutions weÂ offer toÂ our clients

Requirements

  • Minimum ofÂ 3Â years inÂ aÂ production environment (Middle+ level)
  • Proficiency inÂ Python
  • Core knowledge ofÂ Machine Learning
  • Experience with atÂ least one cloud platform (preferably Azure, followed byÂ AWS orÂ GCP)
  • English proficiencyÂ â€” B2

WeÂ offer

  • Work onÂ aÂ flexible schedule remotely orÂ from any ofÂ our comfortable offices orÂ coworking spaces inÂ Ukraine
  • Receive the necessary equipment toÂ perform your work tasks
  • Change projects and technology stacks within EPAM
  • Gain experience inÂ various business domains (Insurance, E-commerce, Healthcare, Finance, Travelling, Media, Artificial Intelligence, and more)
  • Consider relocation options inÂ over 30Â countries worldwide
  • Participate inÂ volunteer, charity programs and communities (both technical and interest-based)
  • You can plan your individual career path together with your manager
  • Receive regular feedback from colleagues
  • Improve your English for free with certified teachers (Speaking Clubs, client interview preparation courses, etc.)
  • Get the opportunity toÂ undergo free training and certification inÂ AWS, GCP, orÂ Azure Clouds
  • Use the internal E-learn training program (18,200+ specialized training and mentoring programs)
  • Access corporate accounts onÂ LinkedIn Learning, Get Abstract and other partner resources
  • Study atÂ EPAM Solution Architecture School with the instructors who are practicing architects
  • Develop asÂ aÂ leader, join Delivery Management, Resource Management, Leadership Essentials school and more
  • Participate inÂ internal communities (500+Â meetups, technical discussions, brainstorming sessions, online events and conferences annually)
  • Vacation and sick leave (including aÂ sick leave without aÂ medical certificate)
  • AÂ wide range ofÂ Voluntary Medical Insurance programs providing both medical treatment and various preventive options (including sports activities)
  • Medical insurance for family members atÂ corporate rates
  • Company support during significant life events (childbirth orÂ adoption, marriage, etc.)
  • Support for psychological comfort: discounts onÂ services from mental health specialists orÂ coaches, thematic training
  • E-kids programÂ â€” aÂ free programming language training program for EPAMersâ€™ children

EPAM strives toÂ provide its global team ofÂ over 52,800+ professionals inÂ more than 55Â countries with opportunities for professional growth from day one ofÂ collaboration. Our colleagues are the source ofÂ EPAM's success, soÂ weÂ value cooperation, strive toÂ always understand our clients' business and aim for the highest quality standards. NoÂ matter where you are, you will join aÂ dedicated, diverse community that will help you realize your potential toÂ the fullest.

title: Python Software Engineer for Machine Learning Retraining

description:
Company Description:

AtÂ Ceres, weâ€™re building the worldâ€™s most advanced data analytics platform for agriculture. WeÂ believe the future ofÂ agriculture depends onÂ building the right tools toÂ help farmers, insurers, lenders, and sustainability partners make the most ofÂ their limited resources. WeÂ are aÂ science-driven organization with aÂ vision ofÂ sustainable agriculture that works for farmers.

The Role:

WeÂ are seeking aÂ backend engineer with 3+Â years ofÂ software engineering experience who can helpÂ us maintain and build internal tooling for our global team ofÂ GIS analysts that allowsÂ us toÂ scale our existing business and integrate new products into the product delivery pipeline. AsÂ aÂ member ofÂ our team, youâ€™ll:

  • Work closely with our analysts toÂ understand and implement their requested changes toÂ existing geospatial workflows/pipelines
  • Identify opportunities toÂ streamline processes and make them faster and more scalable
  • Cooperate with other engineers toÂ ensure that youâ€™re implementing tools that will function well within aÂ complex and integrated environment ofÂ automated data processing pipelines, human-in-the-loop imagery processing, and all the necessary data management tools that enableÂ us toÂ acquire and process tens ofÂ thousands ofÂ acres ofÂ aerial imagery each day
  • Collaborate with our scientists toÂ help bring their proof-of-concept analyses toÂ life byÂ fully operationalizing them and ensuring weÂ can deliver atÂ scale
  • Monitor and troubleshoot processing issues
  • Write clean, readable, code that isÂ maintainable over time

Skills:

Required Skills

  • Strong knowledge ofÂ Python
  • Proficiency with backend frameworks (Django preferred)
  • Proficiency inÂ front-end technologies, particularly React
  • Strong communication skillsÂ â€” youâ€™ll beÂ collaborating with aÂ variety ofÂ teams with differing technical backgrounds
  • English language competency

Nice toÂ Have

  • Familiarity with geospatial tools (QGIS, python-based raster processing libraries such asÂ rasterio and geopandas)
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud)

Employee benefits:

  • Flexible schedule: 8-hour work day with opportunity toÂ work remotely
  • Comfortable office within walking distance ofÂ aÂ metro station
  • Work closely with anÂ international team
  • Registration inÂ the format within DiiaCity (Gig-contract)
  • Free health insurance after aÂ probationary period

title: Ğ ython developer

description:

InÂ this role, you will develop, optimize, and maintain backend systems toÂ support our advanced IoT devices, working closely with frontend and embedded teams toÂ create anÂ efficient and secure platform.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems using Django for IoT control and monitoring
  • Implement and optimize RESTful APIs and WebSocket communication for real-time data handling
  • Integrate MQTT protocols toÂ support seamless communication with IoT devices
  • Develop secure authentication and authorization layers using OAuth2 and JWT for data protection and access control
  • Collaborate with frontend developers toÂ ensure seamless data flow andÂ UI integration
  • Work with embedded engineers toÂ manage data communication and control between the backend and IoT devices
  • Optimize code for performance, scalability, and security
  • Debug, test, and troubleshoot toÂ ensure system reliability and accuracy

Requirements:

  • Proven experience inÂ backend development with Python, particularly with Django
  • Strong understanding ofÂ RESTful APIÂ design, WebSocket, and MQTT for real-time communication
  • Experience implementing authentication with OAuth2 and token-based authorization using JWT
  • Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and ORM frameworks
  • Familiarity with Docker, Git, and CI/CD pipelines
  • Knowledge ofÂ data serialization formats (e.g., JSON, XML) and handling real-time data

Preferred Skills (Plus):

  • Experience with IoT platforms, protocols, orÂ data handling
  • Familiarity with embedded systems orÂ devices, including data flow between IoT devices and backend systems
  • Knowledge ofÂ data visualization tools orÂ libraries
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and deployment

title: Backend Engineer

description:
AtÂ SPDÂ Technology, weÂ bring together aÂ team ofÂ like-minded people who are driven byÂ the desire toÂ bring value through their work, united inÂ their commitment toÂ high performance and delivering custom, cutting-edge tech solutions that drive clientsâ€™ growth. WeÂ empower our people with aÂ culture ofÂ excellence and enable them with the opportunity toÂ uphold their accountability toÂ contribute onÂ each level. WeÂ value humanity and collaboration, encourage professional and personal growth, and foster aÂ supportive and flexible work environment where everyoneâ€™s contribution isÂ welcomed.

WeÂ are looking for aÂ Software Development Engineer inÂ Test toÂ joinÂ us asÂ part ofÂ our team.

About the role

The person inÂ this role will helpÂ us toÂ control quality ofÂ the data, generated byÂ our DNA sequencer.

About the project

Roche Sequencing Solutions Santa Clara, isÂ aÂ fast moving, highly interdisciplinary and technical team ofÂ people with the ambitious goal ofÂ disrupting Next Generation DNA Sequencing. Our technology fuses active biological and solid state elements toÂ bring single molecule based sequence detection toÂ scale. Developing this unique platform requires expertise across aÂ range ofÂ fields including Software Engineering, Bioinformatics, Computational Sciences, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, Biology, Chemistry and related fields. AsÂ aÂ Senior Software Developer inÂ Test, you will have the opportunity toÂ work with experts inÂ these fields toÂ drive toward the common goal ofÂ bringing our sequencing platform toÂ market. You will beÂ responsible for test design, development, automation, deployment, execution, and reporting. InÂ this role, you will represent quality engineering and verification onÂ behalf ofÂ your feature team inÂ Agile events and activities.

Team

Integration team, 6Â team members (automation engineers)

Tech stack

Python, Conda, Behavior Driven Development (PyTest-BDD, Cucumber), Gherkin, Ubuntu, Docker, Jenkins, Bash, Groovy, C++/CUDA, JIRA, Github, etc.

Work Environment

Work schedule isÂ flexible, but some intersection with team members isÂ different timezones will beÂ required (two regular meetings per week).

AsÂ aÂ qualified expert You will

  • Develop and enhance frameworks toÂ facilitate automated verification ofÂ algorithms and validation ofÂ results asÂ part ofÂ continuous integration, nightly builds, and release builds
  • Develop, document, and execute manual and automated tests with varying difficulty toÂ verify functionality and quality ofÂ both research and production software
  • Develop and contribute toÂ data synthesis ofÂ reports inÂ dashboards toÂ provide aÂ cohesive, first class data visualization experience
  • Build and optimize innovative solutions that support advanced, modular verification strategies, data analysis, ML-based systems and workflows
  • Perform independent execution and completion ofÂ tasks byÂ taking full ownership and byÂ showing strong attention toÂ detail that leads toÂ quality outputs
  • Collaborate with research scientists, bioinformaticians, systems engineers, software developers, and software quality verification engineers toÂ ensure robustness and performance ofÂ built and tested software

Weâ€™re looking for you ifÂ you have

  • Bachelor Degree inÂ Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, orÂ related quantitative field
  • Minimum ofÂ 2+Â years ofÂ Python developer proficiency with quantitative analysis experience with packages such asÂ numpy, pandas, scipy, scikitlearn, matplotlib, etc
  • Proficiency inÂ Linux environment (including shell scripting)
  • 1+Â years ofÂ experience with automation frameworks inÂ software testing (e.g. PyTest, Cucumber)
  • Experience and/or technical depth inÂ atÂ least one data science-related field such asÂ Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Statistical &Â Data Analysis, Computational Algorithms, Data Engineering, etc
  • Experience working with aÂ variety ofÂ complex, large datasets
  • Experience building automated pipelines (e.g. Jenkins, Airflow, etc)
  • Experience building orÂ understanding ofÂ end-to-end, distributed and high-performance software infrastructures
  • Proven ability toÂ work collaboratively asÂ part ofÂ aÂ team
  • Proven ability toÂ take ownership with strong attention toÂ detail and with timely quality deliverables
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Whatâ€™s inÂ itÂ for You

Reveal great tech solutions

Join the team ofÂ experts who create custom, cutting-edge tech solutions for world-renowned businesses, fueling client growth. Unleash your potential, tackle new challenges, and beÂ part ofÂ aÂ team that values your skills and contributions. Focus onÂ long-term impact and building tailored, long-lasting partnerships with our clients.

Experience anÂ agile and flexible working environment

Enjoy the freedom ofÂ fully remote work with aÂ flexible working schedule. Empower yourself with aÂ stable workload and aÂ stable income, supported byÂ provided laptops and licensed software. WeÂ focus onÂ lasting cooperation and unite result-oriented individuals who stand onÂ aÂ high-performance approach toÂ work.

Embrace the opportunity for personal and professional growth

Benefit from performance and merit reviews, elevate your skills with personal development plans, and individual learnings through the corporate library, public speaking support, and more.

BeÂ among like-minded people

Work with aÂ team ofÂ one mind who cares about what they doÂ and how theyÂ do. Collaborate with top-notch experts who are always ready toÂ help and support you through any challenges. Join company-wide tech and cultural events, and contribute toÂ meaningful CSR initiatives that resonate with your values. Feel supported byÂ yourÂ HR, and take advantage ofÂ our referral bonus program.

Interview steps

  • Pre-Screening with the recruiter (upÂ rto 30-45 min.)
  • Technical Interview (upÂ toÂ 1-1.5 hour).
  • Client Interview + Live Coding(up toÂ 1-1,5 hour).
  • Client Test Task
title: Software Development Engineer in Test (Python)

description:
Intetics Inc, aÂ leading global technology company providing custom software application development, distributed professional teams, software product quality assessment, and â€œall-things-digitalâ€ solutions, isÂ seeking aÂ talented Senior MLÂ Engineer toÂ join our team.

Objective: This project aims toÂ develop aÂ chatbot platform that serves asÂ aÂ centralized, trusted source ofÂ information for communities affected byÂ the crisis inÂ Ukraine. The chatbot will deliver critical, harmonized messages onÂ humanitarian assistance, including details onÂ cash and in-kind aid, fraud prevention, and contact information for relevant organizations.

Key Features:

  1. Information Hub: The chatbot will provide affected individuals with access toÂ essential information regarding humanitarian assistance options and resources, available onÂ popular platformsÂ â€” Telegram and Viber.
  2. User-Centric Design: Built toÂ support both Ukrainian and English languages, the chatbot will include accessibility features for users with disabilities and will cater toÂ aÂ diverse audience, targeting upÂ toÂ 200,000 users inÂ the first year.
  3. Scalability and Security: Hosted onÂ aÂ secure, scalable cloud infrastructure, the platform will implement robust security measures toÂ protect user interactions and data.
  4. Content Management System (CMS): AÂ custom CMS will enable non-technical staff toÂ manage and update content, ensuring the chatbot remains current and relevant.
  5. Analytics and Monitoring: The platform will include aÂ dashboard toÂ monitor usage and user engagement, allowing continuous optimization based onÂ real-time data.

Timeline and Support: The implementation time isÂ upÂ toÂ 6Â months, including planning, development, testing, and monitoring phases (+6Â months inÂ addition). Post-launch, the chatbot will undergo regular updates based onÂ user feedback and data insights toÂ ensure itÂ meets ongoing humanitarian needs.

Impact: This chatbot will enhance access toÂ humanitarian aid information for Ukrainians, supporting transparency, fraud prevention, and efficient resource navigation, and will play aÂ vital role inÂ the humanitarian response led byÂ the Emergency Telecommunications Cluster (ETC) and partners.

Responsibilities:

  1. Chatbot Development and Architecture:
  • Design and implement aÂ secure chatbot platform using Django (Python) orÂ Node.js, ensuring scalability toÂ support 200,000Â users.
  • Develop aÂ one-way communication interface tailored for efficient information dissemination and anti-fraud messaging.
  • Ensure compliance with WFP and humanitarian principles and guidelines, focusing onÂ aÂ user-friendly, accessible interface.
  • User Interface and Accessibility:
    • Create aÂ chatbot interface that isÂ intuitive, accessible, and inclusive ofÂ users with disabilities (e.g., voice speaker options, and special text).
    • Implement language support for Ukrainian and English, ensuring localization and context relevance for Ukrainian users.
    • Provide options for text and voice interaction toÂ accommodate different user needs and preferences.
  • Backend and Database Management:
    • Set upÂ and manage aÂ scalable PostgreSQL database hosted onÂ AWS, with automated backup and disaster recovery.
    • Optimize the backend toÂ handle high traffic, monitor performance, and integrate anÂ analytics dashboard toÂ track user behavior and chatbot effectiveness.
  • Security and Data Protection:
    • Implement robust security measures, including data encryption (AES-256), role-based access control (RBAC) toÂ CMS, and multi-factor authentication (MFA) toÂ CMS.
    • Ensure secure API integration with Telegram and Viber for messaging, implementing rate limiting and DDoS protection.
  • APIÂ Integration:
    • Integrate with Telegram and Viber APIs toÂ facilitate platform accessibility and efficient information sharing.
    • Implement Google TTS orÂ similar services for voice responses toÂ enhance accessibility for users who may prefer audio content.
  • Content Management System (CMS):
    • Develop aÂ CMS with aÂ user-friendly, WYSIWYG interface, allowing non-technical staff toÂ manage content without altering the system code.
    • Set upÂ role-based access control within the CMS toÂ limit content updates toÂ authorized personnel only.
  • Monitoring, Analytics, and Reporting:
    • Set upÂ real-time monitoring using AWS CloudWatch, tracking system performance, user interactions, and traffic patterns.
    • Develop anÂ analytical dashboard toÂ track user behavior, chatbot interactions, and key metrics, integrating insights for potential future database integration.
  • Testing, Rollout, and Maintenance:
    • Define and execute testing phases, including user acceptance and bug resolution.
    • Develop aÂ demo and assist inÂ the rollout process, implementing updates and improvements based onÂ user feedback and analytics.
    • Provide training for super users onÂ content management and dashboard usage.
    • Offer ongoing support for maintenance, ensuring regular updates and adjustments toÂ meet user needs.

    Requirements:

    • Technical Skills: Expertise inÂ Django orÂ Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, API integration (Telegram, Viber), and Google TTS.
    • Security Expertise: Strong knowledge ofÂ secure coding practices, encryption, and access control mechanisms.
    • Project Management: Proven ability toÂ independently manage the end-to-end project, meeting milestones within aÂ 6-month timeline.
    • Communication Skills: Excellent documentation and training capabilities toÂ support non-technical users.

description:

title: Senior Python Developer

description:
WeÂ are seeking aÂ talented Middle Backend Software Engineer toÂ join our team. InÂ this role, you will contribute significantly toÂ developing highly scalable server-side applications and services. You will play aÂ pivotal role inÂ system architecture, APIÂ design, and the optimization ofÂ backend system performance.

About the project:
Big pharma companies spend hundreds millions USD for compliance checkÂ â€” toÂ beÂ sure that their drugs are marketed and advertised inÂ aÂ right wayÂ â€” without discriminating people, raising any problematic questions, abusing some moral standards. And that they comply with regulations and standards. InÂ order toÂ achieve this, companies prepare tons ofÂ documentation and have toÂ analyze existing standards which frequently change. Revisto, with the help ofÂ AI andÂ ML, want toÂ automate big part ofÂ this compliance and marketing materials check.

Responsibilities:

  • Efficient Development: Design and create efficient, reusable, and scalable backend components and services.
  • APIÂ Development: Develop RESTful APIs and integrations toÂ support client applications and services.
  • Performance Optimization: Enhance backend systems toÂ ensure high availability, rapid response times, and robustness.
  • Feature Implementation: Implement new features and capabilities toÂ extend the functionality ofÂ the backend system.
  • Bottleneck Resolution: Identify and address bottlenecks inÂ the backend infrastructure toÂ optimize system performance.
  • Maintenance: Maintain and provide support for existing backend applications and infrastructure.
  • Quality Assurance: Collaborate closely with quality assurance and testing teams toÂ implement best practices inÂ development.

Knowledge ofÂ some ofÂ these technologies would beÂ aÂ plus:
â€¢ Flask
â€¢ FastAPI
â€¢ SQLAlchemy
â€¢ AsyncIO
â€¢ OAUTH2/OIDC
â€¢ Pandas/Numpy

Requirements:

  • Experience: AÂ minimum ofÂ 4+Â years inÂ aÂ backend development role orÂ aÂ similar role.
  • Programming Skills: Proficiency inÂ Python
  • Database Expertise: Experience working with Postgres.
  • APIÂ Development: Proficiency inÂ developing and consuming RESTful APIs.
  • Security and Performance: Understanding ofÂ web application security and performance tuning.
  • Collaborative Nature: Ability toÂ collaborate effectively with cross-functional product teams.
  • Communication Skills: Strong communication and analytical skills.

WeÂ offer:

  • 20Â working days ofÂ paid vacation per year;
  • Official holidays ofÂ UkraineÂ â€” days off;
  • Modern equipment for work;
  • Corporate events;
  • External and internal training: conferences, professional events, courses, TechTalks;
  • English speaking club.

Hiring process:

  • Review CV;
  • HRÂ interview;
  • Professional interview with client.
title: Python Developer

description:
Digis isÂ seeking aÂ skilled and motivated Senior Full-Stack (Python + TypeScript) Developer toÂ join our remote team.

About the project:
The product isÂ close toÂ SaaS inÂ concept, aÂ set ofÂ technologies and tools that allows businesses toÂ enter marketplaces for used goods like Craigslist. Right now, these marketplaces are mostly private individuals. WeÂ emphasized that this isÂ not aÂ classic standalone product, but aÂ set ofÂ tools like Chrome extension, different no-code solutions with automation, etc. There isÂ aÂ pilot version, which has been successfully released, and there isÂ aÂ big partner inÂ the US.

What about requirements?

  • 5+Â years ofÂ general experience;
  • AtÂ least 2Â years with Python;
  • 1Â year with Javascript orÂ Typescript;
  • Experience with low-code platforms (like make.com orÂ AirTable);
  • Willingness toÂ work onÂ Chrome extension;
  • Ğ’2+Â English level;

Project advantages:

  • AÂ stable and long-term project that has received the support ofÂ large investors from the US;

  • Potential toÂ become something big inÂ the future.

IfÂ youâ€™re interested inÂ this opportunity, please let meÂ know and Iâ€™ll provide more information. IÂ look forward toÂ hearing back from you!
title: Senior Full Stack (Python + TypeScript) Developer

description:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ person who isÂ passionate about development and isÂ excited toÂ join the team ofÂ our Engineers
What you will beÂ doing:
Crafting anÂ elegant, resilient, and useful distributed system for booking business travels.

You certainly:
â€”Â Have 6+Â years ofÂ strong experience working with Python and Django and aÂ continuous desire toÂ improve your skills.
â€”Â Have experience with asynchronous programming (asyncio, aiohttp)
â€”Â Are familiar with atÂ least one RDBMS (Postgres) and with NoSQL solutions (MongoDB)
â€”Â Can write unit tests and autotests
â€”Â Have aÂ high level ofÂ responsibility and independence
â€”Â Have aÂ B2+Â (upper Intermediate +) level ofÂ English and are ready toÂ use itÂ inÂ everyday communication
â€”Â Have experience with elastic search
â€”Â You can beÂ located anywhere in +/- 2Â hours Kyiv timezone, but you have toÂ beÂ initially aÂ citizen ofÂ Ukraine.
â€”Â Can legally travel abroad ifÂ neededÂ â€” position may require business trips inÂ the EU.

You probably:
â€”Â Have contributed toÂ anÂ open-source project
â€”Â Have experience inÂ mentoring newcomers and leading small project groups
â€”Â Have experience with Docker and K8s

Who weÂ are:
WeÂ are aÂ tech team ofÂ adventurous travelers, who were once aÂ part ofÂ YCombinator alumniÂ â€” GetGoing Inc., founded inÂ 2012 byÂ Harvard, Stanford, and Berkeley graduates. WeÂ also raised ~$10M inÂ venture capital from Silicon Valley.
InÂ 2016Â we joined BCD Travel (www.bcdtravel.com), aÂ global corporate travel management company with annual sales ofÂ $25Â billion, toÂ bring our unique technology ofÂ hotel booking toÂ BCD Travelâ€™s products.

What weÂ do:
The product weÂ develop isÂ aÂ B2B booking platform for business trips, which helps users book hotels, flights, and cars. ItÂ provides both business travelers and their travel agents with detailed itineraries and the best booking options. Every day thousands ofÂ business travellers across the world use our software built onÂ modern technology.

WeÂ use:
OnÂ FE: ES6 and React/Redux.
OnÂ BE: Python 3Â as wellÂ as: Django, DRF, Celery, Gevent, aiohttp, Airflow, Postgresql, Redis, Memcache, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Ansible, Stackstorm, Splunk, Docker. Everything isÂ running onÂ AWS.

What weÂ offer:
â€”Â Results-oriented startup mindset with aÂ stable business model backed byÂ aÂ billion-dollar global travel company.
â€”Â Money, ofÂ course. Medical insurance. English courses. Cookies.
â€”Â Conferences, workshops, certifications refund.
â€”Â AÂ friendly, professional, and highly skilled team working with the newest technologies.
â€”Â AÂ great office location inÂ the very center ofÂ Kyiv near metro stations Zoloti Vorota/ Teatralna/ Khreschatyk (weÂ have anÂ extra â€œcoffeeâ€ kitchen for coffee geeks, aÂ game zone with aÂ kicker and aÂ bomb shelter inÂ the building).
â€”Â Flexible working hours and the ability toÂ choose between office, remote, orÂ aÂ mix ofÂ both.
â€”Â 24Â working days ofÂ vacation + 6Â covered sick days.
â€”Â AÂ chance toÂ help craft our tools, processes, and culture.
â€”Â AÂ lab day once aÂ month toÂ dedicate toÂ aÂ project ofÂ your own orÂ aÂ study project.
â€”Â Opportunities for career growth.

title: Python/Django Web Developer, Middle+\Senior

description:
Job Description:


AsÂ the Senior Python Backend Developer, you will beÂ responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining aÂ high-load microservices architecture with aÂ focus onÂ reliability, scalability, and exceptional code quality. You will work closely with cross-functional teams toÂ ensure seamless integration and high availability, handling millions ofÂ transactions while maintaining robust system performance.

This role demands expertise inÂ managing complex backend systems, optimizing performance under heavy load, and ensuring that the technical solutions align with high standards ofÂ quality and reliability.

Requirements:

  • 6+Â years Experience inÂ Python backend development, particularly with high-load systems and scalable microservices;
  • Strong expertise inÂ microservices architecture and technical patterns, with aÂ focus onÂ observability, logging (especially ELK stack), and proactive quality monitoring;
  • Proficiency with one orÂ more frameworks such asÂ FastAPI, Tornado, AIOHTTP, Django, orÂ Flask;
  • Experience with AI-tool for accelerating software engineering (Compilot, AWS QÂ for Dev);
  • Advanced experience with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., Postgres, Cassandra, MongoDB) and ORMs;
  • Solid experience deploying containerized applications onÂ Kubernetes and Docker;
  • Deep understanding ofÂ the SDLC, CI/CDÂ processes, and maintaining high code quality;
  • Familiarity with Linux systems, command-line operations and troubleshooting solution;
  • Proactive, goal and result oriented, open-minded, systematic thinker, and strong communication skills.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Architect, develop, and optimize high-load backend services and RESTful APIs, emphasizing performance and scalability;
  • Implement and maintain aÂ robust microservices architecture that ensures high availability and efficient resource management under demanding loads;
  • Drive quality standards through comprehensive observability and logging (especially with the ELK stack), proactive monitoring, and high-level troubleshooting;
  • Collaborate with DevOps toÂ manage containerized deployments onÂ Kubernetes and Docker, ensuring seamless integration and smooth operation;
  • Leverage frameworks such asÂ FastAPI, Tornado, AIOHTTP, Django, orÂ Flask toÂ build efficient, high-performing applications.
  • Optimize relational (Postgres) and NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB) databases, utilizing ORMs for structured data handling and efficient retrieval;
  • Establish best practices inÂ code quality, implementing CI/CDÂ pipelines, unit testing, and adhering toÂ the full SDLC;
  • Work closely with other developers toÂ maintain coding standards, provide mentorship, and drive continuous improvement inÂ performance and quality.

What weÂ offer:

  • Career planning, regular performance review;
  • Paid leave days;
  • Free medical insurance;
  • Sports reimbursement according toÂ Company HRÂ Policies;
  • English lessons, speaking club;
  • The company provides support inÂ the maintenance ofÂ all documentation for private entrepreneurs.
title: Python Developer (Senior)

description:
Team ofÂ UKEESS Software House isÂ currently looking for aÂ Strong Junior DevOps Engineer (with Python) toÂ join our team for aÂ full-time position (remotely inÂ Ukraine orÂ inÂ Lvivâ€™s office).

About the Customer:

Our customer isÂ the worldâ€™s largest DNA network from the USA. With more than 30Â billion digitized global historical records, 130 million family trees, and 18+Â million people inÂ their growing database, our customers help people discover their family stories and gain actionable insights about their health and wellness.

About the Project and Team:

You will join the Science Engineering team working onÂ DNA research projects. This team builds aÂ high-impact feature from scratch. Our team will work onÂ building aÂ DNA-only pedigree showing the relationships between people. WeÂ have more than 1Â trillion DNA relationships inÂ our database, and weÂ will work toÂ get the data into the right places toÂ infer how people are related toÂ each other. WeÂ will build this system with machine learning, data engineering, and smart data storage.

Responsibilities include:

  • Work with various AWS services, create new services using Terraform, configure communication between the services and application
  • Work onÂ and guide microservice REST APIÂ design, communicating and aggregating data from different microservices
  • Working with enterprise tools engineer toÂ deploy the data pipelines
  • Evaluate large datasets, address and resolve reconcilable discrepancies through data analysis, and find opportunities for continuous data improvement.
  • Identify automation opportunities within current analytics processes and work closely with the architecture team toÂ implement the solution.

Required skills:

  • 2+Â years ofÂ professional experience inÂ aÂ DevOps role
  • Good knowledge and commercial experience with the Amazon Web Services ecosystem (IAM, EC2, SQS, SNS, S3, Lambda, Secret Manager)
  • Strong knowledge and commercial experience with Python and Django
  • Strong knowledge and experience with Terraform
  • Commercial experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience development &Â maintenance ofÂ CI/CD pipelines
  • Commercial experience with relational databases (MySQLÂ is preferable)
  • Experience inÂ data mining, large-scale data acquisition, auditing, transformation, and cleaning, both structured and unstructured data
  • English: Upper-intermediate level atÂ least (both spoken and written)

Strong knowledge orÂ commercial experience with the following technologies will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Spark and Airflow
  • Nextflow
  • FSx for Lustre

What doÂ weÂ offer our new colleague?

  • Competitive compensation (based onÂ market data but also depending onÂ the technical level ofÂ the candidate)
  • Flexible work schedule
  • 3Â health packages toÂ choose
  • Annual paid vacation and state holiday celebration
  • Free English classes (online)
  • Individual approach toÂ professional growth
  • Lack ofÂ bureaucracy and micromanagement
  • Modern, comfortable office facilities (aÂ barbecue zone, kitchens, lounge rooms, coffee machines, etc.)
  • Foreign business trips
  • On-site parking lot and charge station for Electric Cars
  • Corporate gifts, celebrations, and fun activities
  • Sports activities: ping-pong, soccer, work-out

Suppose you have aÂ passion for solving challenging problems, building scalable, robust systems, love working with the latest technologies inÂ aÂ fast-paced, flexible environment, and are excited atÂ the prospect ofÂ having aÂ significant impact onÂ products with more than 3Â million paying subscribers. InÂ that case, weÂ want toÂ talk toÂ you! ;-)

title: Middle Strong/Senior Python Developer [USA project]

description:
Overview:
K2G isÂ currently seeking aÂ skilled and motivated C#,.NETÂ / Python Developer toÂ join our team. The ideal candidate will have aÂ strong foundation inÂ C#, .NET, and Python, with aÂ track record ofÂ designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications. This role will focus onÂ enhancing functionalities for our insurance platform, developing microservices toÂ support high-load systems, and leveraging Python for various backend tasks. Candidates should beÂ passionate about delivering high-quality solutions, have experience across various cloud platforms, and have aÂ solid understanding ofÂ database design and REST APIÂ development.

description:
About you:

WeÂ are seeking anÂ Android Developer with aÂ backend focus toÂ join aÂ project dedicated toÂ improving agriculture inÂ developing countries. This role involves creating aÂ mobile application MVP designed toÂ enhance agricultural practices through innovative data collection and phenotyping techniques. You will beÂ instrumental inÂ crafting intuitive user interfaces for Android and developing robust backend systems toÂ ensure reliable data handling, storage, and processing inÂ resource-constrained environments.

About project:
This project aims toÂ develop aÂ mobile application MVP that will support agriculture byÂ enabling efficient data collection and real-time analysis. Built specifically for developing countries, the app will utilize innovative phenotyping techniques through smartphone-based imagery toÂ monitor and improve agricultural productivity. ByÂ capturing and processing visual data, the application provides essential insights that help farmers make data-driven decisions, ultimately improving crop yields and resource use.
This solution isÂ tailored for resource-constrained environments, ensuring ease ofÂ use and scalability. The project holds immense potential toÂ create aÂ positive impact onÂ agricultural sustainability inÂ developing regions.

Your area ofÂ responsibility:

  • Develop intuitive and visually appealingÂ UI components for the Android-based imagery phenotyping MVP.
  • Design and implement scalable backend systems for efficient data collection, storage, and processing ofÂ phenotypic information.
  • Create APIs and interfaces for seamless integration with various agricultural hardware and software.
  • Build aÂ user-friendly data collection tool, including aÂ farmer plot registration module asÂ aÂ core component.
  • Establish data validation processes toÂ ensure the accuracy, integrity, and consistency ofÂ collected data, adhering toÂ relevant business rules.
  • Optimize software performance and efficiency within resource-constrained agricultural environments.
  • Conduct regular testing and quality assurance toÂ ensure the reliability and robustness ofÂ the application.
  • Perform thorough unit and integration testing toÂ validate the solutionâ€™s scalability and robustness.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams toÂ gather software requirements and workflows, integrating necessary functionalities while following best practices.
  • Provide technical guidance and training toÂ internal teams onÂ development practices and tools.


Skills and requirements:

  • AtÂ least 3+Â years ofÂ proven experience asÂ anÂ Android Developer;
  • Strong experience with Android (Kotlin, Java, Android studio);
  • Experience with Python;
  • Knowledge ofÂ API development and integration (RESTful services);
  • Experience inÂ cloud services (Google Cloud Platform, AWS, orÂ Azure);
  • Skilled inÂ end-to-end testing, including unit and integration testing, toÂ ensure software reliability and robustness.


Will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Experience with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) orÂ aÂ strong willingness toÂ learnÂ it;
  • Knowledge ofÂ machine learning frameworks orÂ computer vision algorithms, especially asÂ they relate toÂ agricultural orÂ environmental data;
  • Familiarity with working inÂ resource-constrained environments, optimizing for efficiency and performance inÂ challenging conditions.

WeÂ offer:

  • Working inÂ aÂ team ofÂ talented and passionate engineers;
  • Opportunity toÂ work with the most trending technologies;
  • Long-term enjoyable cooperation;
  • Personal legal support;
  • Payable vacation and sick days;
  • Competitive salary depending onÂ your own talents;
  • Regular performance &Â career development reviews;
  • Team building events.
title: Android Developer (with Python experience)

description:
PLVision invites aÂ technical leader with aÂ deep understanding ofÂ networking technologies toÂ joinÂ us asÂ aÂ Networking Quality Assurance Architect (Test Automation). This role offers aÂ perfect opportunity toÂ elevate your career and directly impact the rapidly evolving networking industry.

AsÂ aÂ Networking Quality Assurance Architect (Test Automation) atÂ PLVisionâ€™s Architecture Office, you will play aÂ pivotal role inÂ ensuring the quality ofÂ solutions for innovative networking products, including switches, routers, smartNICs, and DPUs. You will create custom test automation frameworks toÂ streamline the testing process, aligning itÂ with best practices and technological advancements toÂ maintain high software quality standards.

Leveraging our in-demand expertise inÂ computer networking, weÂ extend our exciting long-term projects and start new ones for Fortune 100 clients and global industry leaders. PLVision isÂ aÂ member ofÂ the Linux Foundation, TIP (Telecom Infra project), and its open network operating system projects, SONiC and DENT. WeÂ collaborate daily with top engineers within open-source communities, providing numerous opportunities for growth and aÂ stable career path inÂ aÂ supportive environment. Apply now and joinÂ us!

About PLVision

WeÂ are aÂ software product development company specializing inÂ computer networking and embedded systems. PLVision has offices inÂ Krakow (Poland) and Lviv (Ukraine). Founded inÂ 2007, the company helps networking industry leaders and ambitious startups inÂ the U.S., Israel, and theÂ EU countries toÂ launch innovative products.

Vacancy responsibilities:
â€”Â Design and implement test automation frameworks for networking products, including switches, routers, smart NICs, and DPUs
â€”Â Develop and execute test plans for networking products toÂ ensure they meet quality standards, including functional and non-functional requirements
â€”Â Collaborate with development teams toÂ ensure that test automation isÂ integrated into the development process and that issues are detected and addressed onÂ time
â€”Â Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices for test automation and quality assurance inÂ the networking industry
â€”Â Lead and mentor other members ofÂ the Quality Assurance and testing teams
â€”Â Actively involve yourself inÂ open-source communities related toÂ networking products
â€”Â Research market trends inÂ the networking industry and align test automation strategies with customer product needs

Vacancy requirements:
â€”Â 7+Â years ofÂ experience inÂ Software Testing and Quality Assurance, with aÂ focus onÂ test automation and scripting
â€”Â Proficiency inÂ the Python programming language and experience with other scripting languages
â€”Â Familiarity with test automation frameworks and scripting languages, such asÂ pytest, Robot Framework, and unittest
â€”Â Experience working inÂ the networking industry, specifically with switches, routers, smart NICs, and DPUs
â€”Â Experience with open-source networking operating systems and software, such asÂ SONiC, DENT, Linux, Open vSwitch, and DPDK
â€”Â In-depth knowledge ofÂ networking technologies, protocols, and architectures, including L2/L3Â switching, routing, load balancing, and security
â€”Â Strong understanding ofÂ networking protocols, including TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, VLANs, and VXLAN
â€”Â Strong understanding ofÂ the configuration and operation ofÂ switches, routers, smart NICs, and DPUs
â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ software-defined networking (SDN) concepts and architectures, such asÂ OpenFlow and OVSDB
â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ network testing and monitoring tools like Spirent and Ixia
â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ network emulation and simulation tools like GNS3 and NS-3
â€”Â Experience with network testing tools such asÂ Wireshark, tcpdump, ping, etc.
â€”Â Experience with network automation and programmability using tools such asÂ Ansible and REST APIs
â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ virtualization and containerization tools, such asÂ VirtualBox, Docker, and Kubernetes
â€”Â Good understanding ofÂ CI/CD processes
â€”Â Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
â€”Â Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability toÂ work effectively inÂ aÂ team
title: Networking Automation QA Architect

description:
PLVision invites aÂ Senior QAÂ Automation Engineer toÂ join our growing project. IfÂ you have excellent Python and Bash knowledge and hands-on experience with Layer 2/Layer 3Â protocols testing, this opportunity isÂ for you. InÂ this role, you will verify SAI-like API and enable SONiC (Software for Open Networking inÂ the Cloud) OSÂ support onÂ top ofÂ SAI (Switch Abstraction Interface) for aÂ new router product. You will cooperate with the experienced engineering team and the client, aÂ US-Israel innovative semiconductor startup that creates products for cloud service providers and data center networks.

title: Python Developer

description:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ dynamic Python AIÂ Engineer (Generative NLP, AIÂ Agents, Prompting) with strong experience inÂ Python APIÂ development. This isÂ anÂ exceptional opportunity for someone passionate about shaping the future ofÂ AI-driven conversational interfaces and eager toÂ work with cutting-edge technologies, including API development and integration ofÂ LLMÂ APIs such asÂ those offered byÂ OpenAI.

AsÂ aÂ Python AIÂ Engineer, your primary mission will beÂ toÂ design, develop, and deployÂ AI solutions that integrate into our existing systems. You will have the chance toÂ work onÂ API development asÂ well asÂ prompt-based and API-based solutions, reflecting our commitment toÂ rapid delivery without compromising onÂ innovation.

About the project:

AÂ stable enterprise product for creating marketing presentations, preparing accompanying materials, and developing sales cycle business assistants for global pharmaceutical companies such asÂ AstraZeneca, Novartis, Pfizer, Veeva etc., and financial institutions like ING and Van Lanschot. Completely our code base, weÂ have been developing itÂ since 2015.

Our services are distributed across multiple Availability Zones, adhering toÂ aÂ service-oriented architecture. Since 2018, weÂ have prioritized GraphQL, although weÂ maintain comprehensive support for RESTful APIs. Our core API services are built onÂ aÂ diverse stack ofÂ programming languages, each chosen toÂ optimize task performance. This stack includes aÂ rapidly evolving Golang Core API, legacy Core API services inÂ PHP (leveraging frameworks like Laravel and Yii2) for established business logic and data layer interactions, Node.js (utilizing both JavaScript and TypeScript), Python APIs, and .NET Core C# components.

WeÂ utilize aÂ hybrid cloud infrastructure, harnessing the strengths ofÂ both AWS and GCP toÂ meet our operational needs, and focus onÂ Serverless. Our work also involves extensive integration with APIÂ partners, including Veeva, Salesforce, and aÂ variety ofÂ others, toÂ ensure aÂ seamless and robust service ecosystem.

AsÂ aÂ product with high-security requirements, weÂ undergo regular penetration testing from auditors and client companies toÂ ensure compliance with industry standards such asÂ OWASP, SOC, and ISO.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and deployÂ AI solutions utilizing Python.
  • Construct and enhance Chains, AIÂ Agents, and AIÂ Pipelines with tools such asÂ Langchain and LlamaIndex.
  • Develop robust APIs leveraging Flask and FastAPIÂ frameworks.
  • Develop solutions using Vector Databases.
  • Gather, clean, and analyze data toÂ uncover patterns and derive insights.
  • Research and apply novelÂ AI techniques and algorithms for continuous improvement.
  • Fine-tune LLMs using both manual and automated feedback mechanisms.
  • Ensure the reliability and optimal performance ofÂ AI services through diligent site reliability engineering.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams toÂ craft impactfulÂ AI solutions that drive business growth.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree inÂ Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, orÂ aÂ closely related field.
  • Prompt engineering skills.
  • High proficiency inÂ atÂ least one ofÂ the following programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Golang, orÂ Rust.
  • Minimum ofÂ 1Â year experience inÂ developing AIÂ solutions, preferably with LLMs.
  • Strong foundation inÂ Python, with atÂ least 1Â year ofÂ experience.
  • Ability toÂ design, develop, and deploy machine learning models.
  • Basic NLP skills, including sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and part-of-speech tagging.
  • Understanding ofÂ machine learning principles and algorithms.
  • Familiarity withÂ AI frameworks such asÂ TensorFlow, PyTorch, orÂ scikit-learn.

This position offers the chance toÂ beÂ atÂ the forefront ofÂ AIÂ development, working onÂ solutions that leverage the latest advancements inÂ AIÂ technology. IfÂ you are driven byÂ innovation, eager toÂ tackle challenging problems, and ready toÂ make aÂ significant impact, weÂ would love toÂ hear from you.

Benefits:

InÂ addition toÂ aÂ great base salary, weÂ offer:

1) Funding for conferences, co-working spaces, software licenses, and other work-related expenses

2) MacBook ifÂ you require one

3) Mobile devices ifÂ you are involved with mobile development projects

4) Flexible working hours and fully remote working without micromanagement

5) Modern technology stack

6) Time for open source development

7) Bonus atÂ the end ofÂ the year

8) Paid study leave

9) Paid English language courses

10) **36**Â company-paid days off per annum

11) Access toÂ educational streaming services like Pluralsight

12) Input onÂ the development ofÂ the company

Our core values:

WeÂ are open-minded, humble, respectful, self-driven, and honest, which allowsÂ us toÂ create anÂ atmosphere ofÂ synergy. Our team isÂ aÂ great fit for those who value self-organization and are passionate about personal growth. IfÂ this resonates with you, weâ€™d love toÂ have you join the team.

title: Senior Python Developer

description:
WeÂ are seeking aÂ Senior Full stack (React orÂ Vue+Python) Engineer who isÂ passionate about revolutionizing the medical records industry.

Our client project aims toÂ modernize the way medical records are handled and transferred. They are addressing the issue ofÂ outdated and inefficient practices inÂ patient data management, which often involve fax machines and can lead toÂ lost orÂ delayed information, unnecessary reordering ofÂ tests, and even malpractice claims.

The solution isÂ toÂ digitize the transfer and release ofÂ patient data, providing aÂ more reliable and secure method ofÂ handling this critical information. This digital approach isÂ intended toÂ improve patient outcomes byÂ ensuring that all relevant health data isÂ readily available when and where itâ€™s needed.

The team

From the clientâ€™s side, there will beÂ atÂ least 10Â very strong software engineers from the heart ofÂ software development and innovationÂ â€” San Francisco!

Communication and collaboration are key, while you will beÂ able toÂ communicate directly with theÂ US team itÂ isÂ important toÂ beÂ ready toÂ cover someÂ US working hours (approximately upÂ toÂ 19.00-19.30 CET).

Requirements

â€”Â 4+Â years ofÂ working experience using Python;
â€”Â 2+Â years ofÂ experience with React orÂ Vue.js;
â€”Â Hands-on experience with Django;
â€”Â Experience with GraphQLÂ or REST;
â€”Â SQL and NoSQLÂ databases;
â€”Â AtÂ least anÂ Upper-intermediate level ofÂ English.

Responsibilities
â€”Â BeÂ ready toÂ work with Research &Â Development tasks;
â€”Â BeÂ ready toÂ work during American working hours;
â€”Â BeÂ ready toÂ work using the pair programming technique;
â€”Â BeÂ ready toÂ enforce best practices and improve test coverage;
â€”Â Have fun and make anÂ impact while developing awesome and cool software;
â€”Â Take part inÂ requirements analysis, task planning, estimation, and coding.
â€”Â Suggest technical and functional improvements for the project;
â€”Â Maintain close collaboration with other team members (aka find some great new friends).

title: Lead Python Engineer

description:
DataRobot accelerates the process ofÂ building predictive models toÂ get the most out ofÂ valuable data. InÂ order toÂ keep upÂ with the demand for new features inÂ DataRobot, weÂ are looking toÂ grow our Backend engineering team. The primary responsibilities ofÂ this team include developing and supporting new data science tools, designing and supporting our APIs, and instrumenting DataRobot toÂ integrate with enterpriseÂ IT infrastructure. Our team leverages modern technologies toÂ achieve our goals and innovate onÂ our solutions.

  • Design infrastructure for new features with the input ofÂ peers.
  • Manage individual projects and milestones with abundant communication ofÂ progress.
  • Seek, give, and receive critical feedback inÂ aÂ constructive manner, including but not limited toÂ code reviews.

Knowledge, Skills &Â Abilities:

  • Due toÂ the multiple levels ofÂ Backend Engineers, this isÂ aÂ wide range from 5Â years upÂ toÂ 10+Â years ofÂ proven experience writing high-quality code using Python and/or Go
  • Strong Computer Science fundamentals inÂ object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem-solving, and complexity analysis.

  • Deep experience with automated testing and test-driven development

  • Real-world experience decoupling monolithic software into smaller reusable components

  • Personal drive toÂ get things finished.
  • Effective communication behavior.
  • Fundamental understanding ofÂ Kubernetes and Helm. Experience inÂ building and running software systems onÂ Kubernetes clusters inÂ production
  • Hands-on experience with infrastructure provisioning and configuration using Infrastructure asÂ Code (IaC) principles

Nice toÂ have:

title: Senior Backend Engineer

description:

What project weÂ have for you

They created aÂ management platform that allows toÂ easily manage all operations, from scheduling toÂ payroll. With over 3.8B deskless workers across the globe, the challenges and potential are endless. AtÂ Intellias, weÂ are committed toÂ being anÂ equal opportunity employer, fostering equity, diversity, and inclusion. WeÂ welcome and celebrate the differences ofÂ all qualified applicants. Join Intellias for aÂ career where your unique perspectives are not only valued but crucial toÂ our success.
title: Senior FullStack Developer (Python/React)

description:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ FullStack Engineer toÂ join our team and help modernize anÂ existing system. Your mission will beÂ toÂ enhance the current system, improving scalability and maintainability. AÂ key aspect ofÂ the project will involve understanding and working with the existing logic, which will require reverse engineering and translating itÂ into aÂ more scalable, modern language. This process isÂ essential toÂ enable product development and support the business asÂ itÂ scales.

Project Overview:

The project goal isÂ toÂ modernize the existing legacy supplier-side platform (SSP) thus enabling further application development. This platform provides the ability toÂ integrate AdÂ Demand Partners (those who want toÂ show ads) and allow AdÂ Inventory Suppliers (website and app owners) toÂ sell advertising space inÂ anÂ efficient manner via real-time auctions, maximizing revenue for Supply and clicks for Demand.

Stack: Legacy: RubyÂ 2.1.3, RailsÂ 3.2.17, Scala, JavaScript, jQuery;
Reverse engineering isÂ expected inÂ Python orÂ Node.js.

The system isÂ based onÂ microservices architecture hosted onÂ AWS. IfÂ functionality needs toÂ beÂ rewritten, the developer will choose the technology toÂ use.

Project stage: The system has anÂ old codebase (over 10Â years old), and several teams have worked onÂ itÂ throughout its history. Ruby part isÂ implemented using outdated Ruby version. WeÂ have conducted initial discovery toÂ understand the scope ofÂ work.

Team composition: 1Â Software Engineer (the one weÂ are looking for), DevOps, QA, DM. The engineer will work independently onÂ the project and make technical decisions autonomously, including proposing solutions toÂ technical and business challenges. Colleagues will beÂ available for consultation asÂ needed.

Position Highlights:

  • The role isÂ technically challenging, requiring strong troubleshooting skills
  • This position isÂ ideal for those who enjoy troubleshooting and engaging inÂ reverse engineering
  • Direct communication with the client
  • There will beÂ opportunities toÂ enhance skills inÂ AWS, asÂ some system features are expected toÂ beÂ developed from scratch using AWS services

Responsibilities:

  • Implementing and optimizing backend services
  • Reverse engineering and modernizing legacy codebase inÂ aÂ new language (Python orÂ Node.js)
  • Ensuring system scalability and performance improvements
  • Analyzing business problems, identifying, proposing the best solutions, and translating business needs into technical requirements
  • Developing technical designs for new features

Qualifications:

  • 5+Â years ofÂ software development experience
  • Experience with Python orÂ Node.js
  • Willingness toÂ work with Ruby, Scala, JS, and AWS
  • Strong knowledge ofÂ microservices architecture
  • Proficient inÂ troubleshooting and problem-solving
  • Familiarity with CI/CD processes isÂ aÂ plus
  • Ability toÂ work independently and make informed decisions
  • AtÂ least anÂ Intermediate level ofÂ English

Our benefits:

  • NoÂ micromanagement
  • Freedom toÂ engage inÂ decision-making and implementation
  • Ability toÂ work inÂ aÂ team ofÂ professionals (the ratio ofÂ middle and above specialists 80/20)
  • Participation inÂ the development ofÂ high-quality products
  • Direct communication with clients onÂ aÂ partnership level
  • Professional development opportunities ($600 education budget, well-managed processes, communities, internal library)

  • $600 extra for the health care, sports, orÂ mental health
  • 20Â paid working days off and 10Â days ofÂ sick leave

  • Soulful team buildings and corporate events

JoinÂ us and beÂ among those who care!

description:

title: Middle Python developer with LLM experience

description:
Zoral Labs, aÂ leading provider ofÂ research and development toÂ the software industry, isÂ searching for anÂ experienced Senior Backend Developer with strong experience inÂ Python andÂ Go toÂ join its development center remotely

Job Description:

AsÂ aÂ Backend Developer, you will beÂ involved inÂ the development and maintenance ofÂ aÂ scalable, mission-critical, data-driven AWS cloud-based online service.

You will collaborate with senior-level development team members toÂ make technical architecture and design decisions. InÂ addition, you will take ownership ofÂ key components ofÂ the online service.

Responsibilities:

  • Engage inÂ discussions toÂ understand both business and technical requirements for the solution.
  • Analyze and determine the solution architecture and design for the components you own.
  • Implement design decisions and fulfill functional and non-functional requirements.
  • Assist the project Data Science team inÂ designing and implementing their components.
  • Collaborate with the projectÂ QA team inÂ testing and resolving issues.
  • Support solution deployment activities.
  • Ensure high performance, reliability, and scalability ofÂ solutions, especially for high-load workflows.
  • Perform code and design reviews, guiding the engineering team.
  • Troubleshoot and optimize workflows, focusing onÂ performance and security.

Requirements:

Must-Have:

  • 5+Â years ofÂ overall software engineering experience.
  • Deep knowledge inÂ Python, including:
    • Flask
    • FastAPI
    • Boto3
  • Hands-on expertise inÂ Golang, with the ability toÂ build and maintain robust backend systems
  • PostgreSQL, SQL/DML/DDL
  • AWS: Lambda, S3, RDS, EKS, SQS, CloudWatch, IAMÂ & secrets management
  • REST API design principles
  • Git/GitLab, GitLab CI/CD
  • Linux
  • Docker
  • Software architecture and design principles

Would beÂ aÂ Plus:

  • Experience with additional AWS services: Textract, EFS, ECR
  • Familiarity with Python libraries for PDF file management
  • Knowledge ofÂ Terraform
  • Background inÂ Computer Science orÂ Mathematics education
  • Understanding ofÂ Kubernetes

About the company:

Zoral isÂ aÂ fintech software research and development company. WeÂ were founded inÂ 2004.

WeÂ operate one ofÂ largest labs inÂ Europe focused onÂ Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML), predictive systems for consumer/SME credit and financial products.

Our clients are based inÂ USA, Canada, Europe, Africa, Asia, South America and Australia.

WeÂ are one ofÂ the worldâ€™s leading companies inÂ the use ofÂ unstructured, social, device, MNO, bureau and behavioral data, for real-time decisioning and predictive modeling.

Zoral software intelligently automates digital financial products.

Zoral produced the worldâ€™s first, fully automated, STP consumer credit platforms.

WeÂ are based inÂ London, New York and Berlin

title: Python Developer

description:
Adwisely (formerly RetargetApp) isÂ aÂ marketing solution that helps e-commerce businesses promote their products onÂ the biggest advertising platforms. Adwisely automatically creates and optimizes effective advertising campaigns. Adwisely isÂ aÂ proud Facebook Marketing Partner and Google Partner.

Weâ€™are looking for aÂ Founding EngineerÂ / Tech Lead toÂ join the team full-time. Youâ€™ll beÂ anÂ integral part ofÂ our core team, playing aÂ key role inÂ shaping the technical direction ofÂ the company. You will take full ownership ofÂ the development process and lead the execution ofÂ our product roadmap, from conception toÂ launch.

What you will need toÂ do

â€”Â take ownership ofÂ all tech processes inÂ product
â€”Â lead the end-to-end development ofÂ our platform and ensure its scalability and performance
â€”Â make architecture and infrastructure decisions that improve the product and quality ofÂ our coding base
â€”Â manage infrastructure and deployment inÂ AWS
â€”Â participate inÂ discussions regarding product vision with founders

This isÂ for you ifÂ you

â€”Â have strong knowledge ofÂ Python 3Â and Django
â€”Â have experience with SQL, PostgreSQL, no-SQLÂ databases, queue managers
â€”Â know principles ofÂ work ofÂ Web (HTTP-protocols and other common protocols)
â€”Â are experienced inÂ building the app architecture

â€”Â know how toÂ keep aÂ balance between architecture-reasonable and efficient decisions
â€”Â pay close attention toÂ details inÂ code reviews, ensuring consistent quality across the board
â€”Â continuously identify areas for improvement within the codebase and contribute toÂ ongoing optimization efforts
â€”Â can bring leadership experience orÂ aÂ desire toÂ grow into aÂ technical leadership role

Will beÂ aÂ plus

â€”Â experience withÂ JS and Front-End technologies
â€”Â knowledge ofÂ GoLang, other languages
â€”Â knowledge ofÂ Facebook Marketing API, Google Ads API, orÂ Shopify APIâ€™s

Why Adwisely?

Impact: Youâ€™ll play aÂ pivotal role inÂ building the future ofÂ Adwisely, driving both technical and business success.
Ownership: AsÂ lead engineering, youâ€™ll have significant input onÂ the product and architecture.
Culture: Join aÂ small, passionate team where your voice matters and where everyone works towards the same goalâ€”helping businesses succeed.
Growth: Get inÂ atÂ the ground level ofÂ aÂ high-growth startup with opportunities for advancement and equity inÂ the company.

What weÂ offer

â€”Â opportunity toÂ earn equity inÂ the company, giving you ownership and aÂ stake inÂ Adwiselyâ€™s success
â€”Â possibility toÂ make architecture decisions and develop asÂ architect
â€”Â opportunity toÂ lead development process and deliver value directly toÂ paying B2B clients
â€”Â 40-hour working week with aÂ flexible schedule and ability toÂ work remotely
â€”Â competitive salary
â€”Â paid vacation

WeÂ are passionate about our Team and the product weÂ create, weÂ never stop learning and always stay curious. Come joinÂ us toÂ grow together!
title: Founding Engineer / Tech Lead (Python / Django / AWS)

description:
Your expertise:

  • Python Expertise: 4Â years+ ofÂ experience inÂ Python, encompassing both commercial and significant personal projects
  • Knowledge and experience with Javascript
  • OOP Mastery: Deep understanding ofÂ Object-Oriented Programming principles and their practical application
  • API Development Skills: Proven track record inÂ developing scalable and efficient APIs, with aÂ focus onÂ BIÂ & Data-centric applications
  • Concurrency and Asynchrony: Proficiency inÂ implementing MultiprocessingÂ / Asynchronous processes toÂ enhance application performance
  • Framework Proficiency: Solid experience with atÂ least one major Python framework (e.g., Django, Celery, FastAPI)
  • Database Expertise: Hands-on experience with atÂ least one relational (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and one non-relational database (e.g., MongoDB, ClickHouse)
  • Version Control: Proficiency with Git (orÂ similar systems like Bitbucket), demonstrating best practices inÂ code versioning and collaboration
  • Testing Frameworks: Experience with atÂ least one ofÂ the major testing frameworks (Pytest, Unittest, etc.), ensuring aÂ robust and reliable codebase
  • CIÂ / CDÂ Tools: Proficiency inÂ using CIÂ / CDÂ tools (e.g., Jenkins) for streamlined and efficient development workflows
  • Containerization: Hands-on experience with Docker, showcasing skills inÂ building, deploying, and managing containerized applications
  • Software Architecture: Strong foundation inÂ software architecture design, especially microservices and event-driven architectures, toÂ support scalable and flexible systems
  • Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: Exceptional analytical abilities with aÂ knack for translating complex business requirements into technical solutions
  • Cloud Services: Proficiency with atÂ least one major cloud service (AWS, Azure, orÂ GCP), and aÂ thorough understanding ofÂ cloud-native architectures
  • Agile Methodology: Experience working inÂ anÂ agile environment, endorsing flexibility, and iterative progress

Will definitely beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Kubernetes (K8s) Proficiency
  • Machine Learning experience
  • Experience with Python ORMs (e.g., SQLAlchemy, Peewee)
  • Foundational Linux Administration and Networking Skills
  • Familiarity with Atlassian Products (Jira, Confluence)
  • Golang Proficiency
  • Experience with WebSockets

Whatâ€™s inÂ itÂ for you?

  • Opportunity toÂ deal with top-notch technologies and approaches inÂ aÂ world-leader product company with millions ofÂ customers
  • Opportunity toÂ make aÂ difference for online privacy, freedom ofÂ speech, and net neutrality
  • Decent market rate compensation depending onÂ experience and skills
  • Developed corporate culture: noÂ micromanagement, culture based onÂ principles ofÂ truth, trust, and transparency
  • â€œYou buildÂ it, you ownÂ itâ€ mentality inÂ most contexts
  • Support ofÂ personal and professional development
    • coverage ofÂ costs ofÂ external trainings, conferences, professional literature
    • support ofÂ experienced colleagues
    • in-house events and trainings
    • regular knowledge sharing inÂ teams
    • English classes and speaking clubs
  • Life-balance support
    • truly flexible schedule, noÂ time-tracking atÂ all
    • 25Â working days ofÂ vacation
    • 5Â days ofÂ paid sick leave per month (ifÂ necessary) without providing aÂ medical certificate
    • generous maternity leave program
  • Professionally strong environment, friendly and open atmosphere, ability toÂ influence the product development and recognition for it

You will beÂ involved into:

Workflow and Process Optimization:

  • Technical Workflows Design: Craft, implement, and refine technical workflows toÂ boost efficiency, collaboration, and code quality, integrating modern CIÂ / CDÂ pipelines and automated testing frameworks
  • Agile Practices: Champion agile methodologies, adapting them toÂ fit the teamâ€™s unique dynamic and project requirements, ensuring agile ceremonies are effectively conducted

Innovation and Technical Advocacy:

  • Research and Innovation: Dedicate time toÂ personal and team-wide research inÂ new technologies, frameworks, and methodologies, fostering anÂ environment ofÂ innovation and experimentation
  • Technical Representation: Serve asÂ the technical voice inÂ cross-departmental meetings, articulating technical solutions and advocating for necessary resources orÂ changes

Strategic and Operational Balance:

  • Strategic Direction: While focusing onÂ hands-on work, align technical direction with strategic business objectives, adapting toÂ evolving market and organizational needs
  • Operational Excellence: Directly contribute toÂ and oversee day-to-day operations, ensuring the teamâ€™s efforts meet current demands while laying the groundwork for future success

About the company and project:

ZONE3000Â is proud toÂ represent its partnership with Namecheap (www.namecheap.com). Namecheap was founded inÂ 2000Â on the idea that all people deserve value-priced domains delivered through stellar service. Today Namecheap isÂ aÂ leading ICANN-accredited domain name registrar and web hosting company with over 13Â million customers and 17Â million domains under managementÂ â€” and weâ€™re just getting started.

Our culture isÂ built onÂ the values that weÂ live every day: the way weÂ work, the way weÂ collaborate with our global network ofÂ colleagues and the way weÂ relentlessly innovate solutions that meet the emerging needs ofÂ our customers.

AtÂ Namecheap, weÂ are looking for aÂ dynamic and experienced Technical Leader with aÂ strong background inÂ BIÂ / MLÂ and Python toÂ spearhead our newly established Intelligence Integration Team (IIT). This team isÂ set toÂ play aÂ pivotal role within our organization, developing both existing and new microservices and infrastructure toÂ integrate the capabilities generated byÂ ourÂ BI business unit seamlessly. This integration spans various domains ofÂ business intelligence and machine learning, facilitating aÂ crucial connection between raw BIÂ & MLÂ outputs and their application across the organization. This includes interfacing with technical teams, asÂ well asÂ supporting business operations such asÂ product development, customer support, and executive decision-making. The IIT isÂ tasked with adhering toÂ and promoting the general architecture and technical standards asÂ defined byÂ the Technology Business Unit ofÂ Namecheap.

Celebrating over 23Â years ofÂ excellence, Namecheap stands asÂ aÂ leading technology firm, excelling inÂ domain registration, web hosting, and many internet services. With our roots deeply embedded inÂ the ethos ofÂ security, privacy, and reliability, weÂ have become the 2nd largest domain registry globally. Our missionÂ â€” toÂ democratize access toÂ domains and empower individuals and businesses toÂ leverage the full potential ofÂ the webÂ â€” isÂ what propelsÂ us forward. AsÂ innovators, weÂ continuously push the envelope inÂ online presence management, ensuring ease ofÂ access and affordability for establishing aÂ digital identity. ByÂ joiningÂ us, you become anÂ integral part ofÂ aÂ forward-thinking team committed toÂ keeping the Internet open and accessible for all.

Our endeavors also include the launch ofÂ Spaceship.com , aÂ novel reimagination ofÂ domain registrar and online services. AsÂ aÂ Technical Leader, you will contribute toÂ Namecheap and Spaceship, driving innovation and excellence.

Our organization leverages advanced Business Intelligence (BI) systems toÂ process approximately 100GB ofÂ data daily, with internal storage exceeding 100TB across various data types. WeÂ currently have 25Â models deployed inÂ production, with aÂ total ofÂ 35Â machine learning models under development and testing. These models, which weÂ update and expand atÂ aÂ rate ofÂ 1-2 every 2-3 months, aim for aÂ benchmark accuracy ofÂ 96-97%. Our data processing infrastructure utilizes aÂ wide range ofÂ sources, including hundreds ofÂ databases, APIs, and crawlers, and operates with aÂ standard one-day latency for business metrics calculations while supporting real-time KPIs. Serving anÂ internal user base ofÂ over 2000Â employees, weÂ handle approximately 10-15 requests daily, with 200 personalized licenses for dailyÂ BI tool usage. Model updates are scheduled according toÂ business needs and can vary from daily toÂ quarterly, ensuring continuous improvement inÂ our operations.st amounts ofÂ data and complex machine learning models, optimizing the flow ofÂ business insights and decision-making processes across the organization. Here are some data points for you toÂ get anÂ idea ofÂ what ourÂ BI team isÂ dealing with onÂ the daily basis.
