title: Senior Python Engineer

description:
AtÂ Preply, weÂ are unlocking human potential through learning.

WeÂ believe learning with aÂ great tutor isÂ life-changing. Thatâ€™s why weÂ match online tutors from across the globe with learners and empower them toÂ create live language classes with AI-powered tools and learning materials. This isÂ how weÂ deliver progress, create engagement and keep our global community ofÂ learners motivated. SoÂ far, over 32,000 tutors have given more than 15Â million lessons toÂ learners from over 175Â countries.


The Preply Engineering Team provides the tools toÂ help unlock human potential through learning.

WeÂ work primarily with Python/Django toÂ build scalable and robust applications. WeÂ implement A/B tests toÂ prove the value ofÂ our initiatives and improve our product based onÂ data and students and tutors feedback. AsÂ part ofÂ our commitment toÂ ensuring high-quality products, weÂ prioritize monitoring and metrics analysis toÂ identify areas for optimization and ensure our services are performing atÂ their best. Our team isÂ made upÂ ofÂ talented engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and developing innovative solutions toÂ drive our companyâ€™s success.

AtÂ Preply, weÂ release our product 50-60 times per day byÂ leveraging top-notch CI/CDÂ processes. AsÂ aÂ fast-growing company weÂ have diverse technical challenges (sometimes weÂ even write about them onÂ our Engineering Blog) that will allow you toÂ develop your skills atÂ scale.

Meet the team!

You will beÂ working inÂ aÂ cross-functional Growth team alongside 5Â other engineers, Product Manager, Tech Lead, Data Analytics, Engineering Manager toÂ deliver the best first experience toÂ our users (upper funnel)

What youâ€™ll beÂ doing:

  • Exploring new strategic bets for the company
  • Developing features and A\B tests around the first usersâ€™ experience, from Matching with the Tutor toÂ the First studentâ€™s lessons onÂ aÂ platform (growth upper funnel)
  • Supporting aÂ product team inÂ ideation, hypothesis validation, and experimentation
  • Improving the observability and quality ofÂ the system
  • Making our best practices even better (test culture, code reviews, monitoring and scalability ofÂ our tools)
  • Collaborating with Product Manager, Researchers and Data leaders toÂ ensure the best user experience

What you need toÂ succeed:

  • AÂ great collaborator with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Minimum B2Â English level.
  • Senior-level experience building modern applications inÂ Python\ Django
  • React orÂ other frontend-focused language experience toÂ occasionally contribute toÂ ourÂ FE systems.
  • BeÂ data-oriented. Work closely with production data and our Data Analyst toÂ find insights. SQL, Amplitude, Looker skills are beneficial.
  • BeÂ pragmatic. Balance short-term speed ofÂ development with the long-term technical quality ofÂ our systems.
  • BeÂ aÂ leader. You will need toÂ solve problems with aÂ high degree ofÂ uncertainty and many stakeholders
  • Expertise inÂ troubleshooting issues, identifying the root cause, mitigatingÂ it, and adding setting upÂ safeguards toÂ prevent future issues.
  • Bring your voice and ideas toÂ the team, thinking beyond the code and about our customers.
  • Willingness toÂ beÂ on-call for your squad (1Â week every 5Â weeks).

Why youâ€™ll love itÂ atÂ Preply:

  • Open, collaborative, dynamic and diverse culture.
  • Generous monthly allowance for lessons onÂ Preply.com .
  • Learning &Â Development budget, including time off for your self-development.
  • Competitive financial package with equity, leave allowance and health insurance.
  • Access toÂ free mental health support platforms.
  • Opportunity toÂ shape the lives ofÂ learners and tutors from over 175 countries through language learning and teaching.

But thereâ€™s more. AtÂ Preply, weÂ focus onÂ doing better every dayÂ â€” pushing the limits ofÂ what weÂ know isÂ possible. And weÂ know our purpose isÂ strong. Weâ€™re re-engineering education, providing outstanding experiences for our global community ofÂ language learners and building authentic connections across the world. Youâ€™ll get toÂ beÂ aÂ part ofÂ our online learning innovation!

Propelled byÂ aÂ tenfold increase inÂ revenues over the last three years, thanks toÂ our best-in-class consumer and B2B products, Preply isÂ now leading the online language tutoring segment globally and has 500+ employees ofÂ over 50Â nationalities based across Barcelona, Kyiv and the US.

WeÂ doÂ extraordinary things atÂ PreplyÂ â€” and weÂ want you toÂ joinÂ us. IfÂ youâ€™re committed toÂ curiosity, love experimentation and relish the challenge ofÂ exploring new ideas, then itâ€™s time weÂ say:

Welcome toÂ The World Class.

Our Principles

  • Care toÂ change the worldÂ â€” WeÂ are passionate about our work and care deeply about its impact toÂ beÂ life changing.
  • WeÂ doÂ itÂ for learnersÂ â€” For both Preply and tutors, learners are why weÂ doÂ what weÂ do. Every day weÂ focus onÂ empowering tutors toÂ deliver anÂ exceptional learning experience.
  • Keep perfectingÂ â€” ToÂ create anÂ outstanding customer experience, weÂ focus onÂ simplicity, smoothness, and enjoyment, continually perfecting itÂ asÂ every detail matters.
  • Now isÂ the timeÂ â€” InÂ aÂ fast-paced world, itÂ matters how quickly weÂ act. Now isÂ the time toÂ make great things happen.
  • Disciplined executionÂ â€” What makesÂ us disciplined isÂ the excellence inÂ our execution. WeÂ set clear goals, focus onÂ what matters, and utilize our resources efficiently.
  • Dive deepÂ â€” WeÂ leverage business acumen and curiosity toÂ investigate disparities between numbers and stories, unlocking meaningful insights toÂ guide our decisions.
  • Growth mindsetÂ â€” WeÂ proactively seek growth opportunities and believe todayâ€™s best performance becomes tomorrowâ€™s starting point. WeÂ humbly embrace feedback and learn from setbacks.
  • Raise the barÂ â€” WeÂ raise our performance standards continuously, alongside each new hire and promotion. WeÂ build diverse and high-performing teams that can make aÂ real difference.
  • Challenge, disagree and commitÂ â€” WeÂ value open and candid communication, even when weÂ donâ€™t fully agree. WeÂ speak our minds, challenge when necessary, and fully commit toÂ decisions once made.
  • One PreplyÂ â€” WeÂ prioritize collaboration, inclusion, and the success ofÂ our team over personal ambitions. Together, weÂ support and celebrate each otherâ€™s progress.

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Preply isÂ committed toÂ creating aÂ diverse and inclusive environment where people from all backgrounds can thrive. Different opinions and viewpoints are key ingredients inÂ our success asÂ aÂ multicultural Ed-Tech company.

Preply will consider all applications for employment without regard toÂ race, color, religion, gender identity orÂ expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age orÂ veteran status. Together, weÂ are The World Class.
title: Senior Back-End Engineer (Python)

description:
Hello, future Rooshmate.

AtÂ Roosh Investment Group weÂ back founders, funders, and forward-thinkers toÂ grow businesses and co-create the technologies that will enrich the world.

Roosh invests inÂ companies focused onÂ capitalization (byÂ Roosh Ventures firm) and profitability (byÂ Roosh X). Weâ€™re aÂ dedicated team ofÂ investors, entrepreneurs and operators. With over 10Â years ofÂ expertise, weÂ act asÂ partners inÂ growing businesses rather than mere financial backers.

Besides, Rooshâ€™s portfolio includes such companies asÂ aÂ deep-tech company ZibraÂ AI, anÂ R&D company Neurons Lab, aÂ multi-product company Reface, the Roosh Circle and AIÂ HOUSE tech communities, and others.

WeÂ are looking for Full Stack Engineer who will develop aÂ platform from scratch and beÂ fully responsible forÂ it. WeÂ need aÂ person, who can react and implement the changes inÂ rapid startup environment. Our engineering team consists ofÂ highly skilled professionals. JoinÂ us building newÂ AI solution from scratch working together with MLÂ team.

You will:

  • participate inÂ decisions regarding application architecture and database design,
  • take responsibility for the development ofÂ the backend and frontend inÂ collaboration with the MLÂ team,
  • improve the existing processes, and architecture, enhance logging, alerting, technical stack,
  • work allocation ofÂ aroundÂ 60% onÂ the Back End andÂ 40% onÂ the Front End,
  • preparing ideas for product development.

About you:

  • 3+Â years ofÂ relevant Full Stack experience,
  • experience ofÂ the web development,
  • experience with AWS(S3, SQS, DocumentDB, EC2, ECS, Lambda),
  • experience with Node.js, TypeScript and frameworks: Nest.js, Fastify, Express,
  • experience with Frontend frameworks and libraries: React, Next.js,
  • experience with NoSQLÂ DBs(MongoDB/CosmosDB/Redis),
  • experience with RBDMS(Postgres/MySQL),
  • experience with containers(Docker, Container services like ECS, Kubernetes),
  • experience with analytics services integration,
  • experience with CI/CD.

AsÂ aÂ Rooshmate, you will have:
â€”Â The coolest team ever
You will join striving and open-minded professionals toÂ share ideas and shape the future.
â€”Â Time-off policy toÂ take your time
Twenty-one days ofÂ vacation, long and short-term sick leaves, compensatory days off, maternity and paternity leaves, and moreÂ â€” everything for you toÂ make upÂ your life according toÂ your needs.
â€”Â Medical insurance
Perfectly packed health care covering dental.
â€”Â Boosting your expertise
Weâ€™re interested inÂ accelerating your growthÂ â€” hence weÂ compensate for your professional development courses and conferences. You will get access toÂ all Roosh educational orÂ business activities, where weÂ engage top-notch experts from diverse areas toÂ master hard and soft skills.
â€”Â Financial support inÂ various life circumstances
WeÂ will support you inÂ joy and sorrow ofÂ this unpredictable life.


How the hiring process goes?

Our hiring process isÂ designed toÂ ensure that weÂ are aÂ perfect match. SoÂ beÂ ready toÂ come across:
â€”Â interview with Recruiter: weâ€™ll talk about Roosh and answer all your questions,
â€”Â tech interview: weÂ want toÂ see how you think, bring ideas, and work with info. Then weâ€™ll give you feedback,
â€”Â call with your future Manager: weâ€™ll discuss the role and the project inÂ detail,
â€”Â reference check: during the process, weâ€™ll contact your previous workplaces toÂ hear something even more exciting about you.

Still not sure whether toÂ goÂ for Roosh orÂ not? Check our values toÂ resonate with yours first here. Anyway, thanks for your interest.

Weâ€™ll review yourÂ CV and everything you have sentÂ us within five working days. IfÂ your background meets our needsÂ â€” weâ€™ll set upÂ aÂ call toÂ get toÂ know each other better. Otherwise, weÂ arenâ€™t quite ready toÂ get along with you atÂ this moment. But noÂ worriesÂ â€” our journey has just started, and weâ€™d love toÂ stay inÂ touch asÂ our team grows and more opportunities emerge. WeÂ wish you the best ofÂ luck with your aspiration.

title: Python/ML Developer

description:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ skilled Python Machine Learning Engineer toÂ join our healthcare project for U.S. hospitals. The ideal candidate will have aÂ strong background inÂ machine learning, data analysis, and software development. You will work onÂ designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models that drive hospital staffing decisions.

Responsibilities:

This isÂ how weÂ deliver progress, create engagement and keep our global community ofÂ learners motivated. SoÂ far, over 32,000 tutors have given more than 15Â million lessons toÂ learners from over 175Â countries.


The Preply Engineering Team provides the tools toÂ help unlock human potential through learning.

WeÂ work primarily with Python/Django toÂ build scalable and robust applications. WeÂ implement A/B tests toÂ prove the value ofÂ our initiatives and improve our product based onÂ data and students and tutors feedback. AsÂ part ofÂ our commitment toÂ ensuring high-quality products, weÂ prioritize monitoring and metrics analysis toÂ identify areas for optimization and ensure our services are performing atÂ their best. Our team isÂ made upÂ ofÂ talented engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and developing innovative solutions toÂ drive our companyâ€™s success.

Meet the team!

What youâ€™ll beÂ doing:

  • Exploring new strategic bets for the company
  • Developing features and A\B tests around the first usersâ€™ experience, from Matching with the Tutor toÂ the First studentâ€™s lessons onÂ aÂ platform (growth upper funnel)

  • Improving the observability and quality ofÂ the system
  • Making our best practices even better (test culture, code reviews, monitoring and scalability ofÂ our tools)
  • Collaborating with Product Manager, Researchers and Data leaders toÂ ensure the best user experience

What you need toÂ succeed:

  • AÂ great collaborator with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Minimum B2Â English level.
  • Senior-level experience building modern applications inÂ Python\ Django
  • BeÂ data-oriented. Work closely with production data and our Data Analyst toÂ find insights. SQL, Amplitude, Looker skills are beneficial.
  • BeÂ pragmatic. Balance short-term speed ofÂ development with the long-term technical quality ofÂ our systems.
  • BeÂ aÂ leader. You will need toÂ solve problems with aÂ high degree ofÂ uncertainty and many stakeholders
  • Expertise inÂ troubleshooting issues, identifying the root cause, mitigatingÂ it, and adding setting upÂ safeguards toÂ prevent future issues.
  • Bring your voice and ideas toÂ the team, thinking beyond the code and about our customers.
  • Willingness toÂ beÂ on-call for your squad (1Â week every 5Â weeks).

Why youâ€™ll love itÂ atÂ Preply:

  • Open, collaborative, dynamic and diverse culture.

  • Learning &Â Development budget, including time off for your self-development.
  • Competitive financial package with equity, leave allowance and health insurance.
  • Access toÂ free mental health support platforms.
  • Opportunity toÂ shape the lives ofÂ learners and tutors from over 175 countries through language learning and teaching.

But thereâ€™s more. AtÂ Preply, weÂ focus onÂ doing better every dayÂ â€” pushing the limits ofÂ what weÂ know isÂ possible. And weÂ know our purpose isÂ strong. Weâ€™re re-engineering education, providing outstanding experiences for our global community ofÂ language learners and building authentic connections across the world. Youâ€™ll get toÂ beÂ aÂ part ofÂ our online learning innovation!

WeÂ doÂ extraordinary things atÂ PreplyÂ â€” and weÂ want you toÂ joinÂ us. IfÂ youâ€™re committed toÂ curiosity, love experimentation and relish the challenge ofÂ exploring new ideas, then itâ€™s time weÂ say:

Welcome toÂ The World Class.

Our Principles

  • Care toÂ change the worldÂ â€” WeÂ are passionate about our work and care deeply about its impact toÂ beÂ life changing.
  • WeÂ doÂ itÂ for learnersÂ â€” For both Preply and tutors, learners are why weÂ doÂ what weÂ do. Every day weÂ focus onÂ empowering tutors toÂ deliver anÂ exceptional learning experience.
  • Keep perfectingÂ â€” ToÂ create anÂ outstanding customer experience, weÂ focus onÂ simplicity, smoothness, and enjoyment, continually perfecting itÂ asÂ every detail matters.
  • Now isÂ the timeÂ â€” InÂ aÂ fast-paced world, itÂ matters how quickly weÂ act. Now isÂ the time toÂ make great things happen.
  • Disciplined executionÂ â€” What makesÂ us disciplined isÂ the excellence inÂ our execution. WeÂ set clear goals, focus onÂ what matters, and utilize our resources efficiently.
  • Dive deepÂ â€” WeÂ leverage business acumen and curiosity toÂ investigate disparities between numbers and stories, unlocking meaningful insights toÂ guide our decisions.
  • Growth mindsetÂ â€” WeÂ proactively seek growth opportunities and believe todayâ€™s best performance becomes tomorrowâ€™s starting point. WeÂ humbly embrace feedback and learn from setbacks.
  • Raise the barÂ â€” WeÂ raise our performance standards continuously, alongside each new hire and promotion. WeÂ build diverse and high-performing teams that can make aÂ real difference.
  • Challenge, disagree and commitÂ â€” WeÂ value open and candid communication, even when weÂ donâ€™t fully agree. WeÂ speak our minds, challenge when necessary, and fully commit toÂ decisions once made.
  • One PreplyÂ â€” WeÂ prioritize collaboration, inclusion, and the success ofÂ our team over personal ambitions. Together, weÂ support and celebrate each otherâ€™s progress.

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Preply isÂ committed toÂ creating aÂ diverse and inclusive environment where people from all backgrounds can thrive. Different opinions and viewpoints are key ingredients inÂ our success asÂ aÂ multicultural Ed-Tech company.

Preply will consider all applications for employment without regard toÂ race, color, religion, gender identity orÂ expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age orÂ veteran status. Together, weÂ are The World Class.

  • Project: SaaS for cash flow management, budget tracking, and optimization. The product will replace and optimize tasks typically done inÂ Excel, such asÂ tracking expenses onÂ office supplies, forecasting costs, and more.

Project Requirements:


    • The app should offer direct forecasting and reporting onÂ cash flow, divided into expenses and detailed future projections.

    • Deviation reports are sent weekly toÂ stakeholders, including management, the board ofÂ directors, and creditors.

  • Hands-on experience with Azure cloud platforms.
  • Experience with Docker

title: Senior Python Developer

description:
Required skills

  • Experience: 5+Â years ofÂ experience inÂ senior-level Python development roles within enterprise environments orÂ reputable outsourcing firms.
  • Technologies: Expertise inÂ Python frameworks (e.g., FastAPI, Flask, Django) for REST, GraphQL, and RPC.
  • Containerization and Orchestration: Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes for containerized deployments.
  • CI/CD and Version Control: Strong experience with GitLab for version control and pipeline automation.
  • Messaging and Data Streaming: Familiarity with Kafka and RabbitMQ for event-driven architecture.
  • Caching and Databases: Hands-on experience with Redis, MySQL, ClickHouse, and understanding ofÂ ACID and CAP theorem for distributed transactions.
  • Security: Knowledge ofÂ authentication and authorization mechanisms (OAuth2, JWT) within Python microservices.
  • Design Patterns: Proficiency with design patterns such asÂ Dependency Injection, Decorators, and principles like SOLID and aspect-oriented programming.
  • DevOps Skills: Experience with cloud providers (AWS orÂ similar) and aÂ plus for familiarity with AWX Ansible orÂ Terraform.
  • Testing: Strong background inÂ unit testing, TDD, and testing distributed systems.

AsÂ aÂ plus

  • Node.js &Â Java: Exposure toÂ additional languages like Node.js orÂ Java.
  • Web Servers and Proxies: Familiarity with NGINX, Apache for server management.
  • Async Programming: Practical experience inÂ asynchronous programming and event-driven architectures.

WeÂ offer

  • Five-day work week within aÂ young and energetic team.
  • Paid vacationÂ â€” 22Â working days per year.
  • Flexible work schedule.
  • Competitive pay reviewed every 12Â months, with ample opportunities toÂ grow.
  • BeÂ aÂ part ofÂ core contributors toÂ aÂ new protocol.

Responsibilities

  • Lead the architecture, design, and implementation ofÂ Python-based microservices and applications.
  • Develop and optimize RESTful APIs, GraphQLÂ endpoints, and RPC interfaces toÂ facilitate seamless, scalable interactions between services.
  • Drive the migration from monolithic toÂ microservices architecture, leveraging SOLIDÂ principles, Dependency Injection, and best-in-class design patterns.
  • Oversee integrations with critical components such asÂ Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, MySQL, ClickHouse, and other data management solutions.
  • Utilize Docker and Kubernetes for efficient containerization and orchestration ofÂ services across environments.
  • Work with modern DevOps practices (AWX Ansible orÂ Terraform) toÂ maintain CI/CD pipelines and streamline deployments.
  • Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth2, JWT, Keycloak) toÂ ensure secure service interactions.
  • Mentor and guide team members onÂ best practices inÂ Python, testing, async programming, and aspect-oriented programming.

Project description

WeÂ are seeking aÂ motivated Senior Python Developer (Tech Lead) with aÂ strong background inÂ developing complex, large-scale systems. This role will involve architecting and building secure and performant Python applications, working closely with containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes, and integrating with various cloud and DevOps platforms. Your experience inÂ microservices and distributed systems will beÂ crucial inÂ migrating monolithic architectures toÂ microservice-driven systems.

Company Overview

WeÂ are aÂ top-tier USA hosting company committed toÂ delivering high-performance, scalable, and secure web hosting solutions. Join our team ofÂ passionate developers and engineers, where youâ€™ll play aÂ pivotal role inÂ architecting and implementing cutting-edge solutions for enterprise-grade applications. AsÂ aÂ Senior Python Developer and Tech Lead, youâ€™ll lead challenging projects, drive key technical decisions, and mentor aÂ talented development team.

Apply Today!

IfÂ you are aÂ seasoned Python expert passionate about leading projects and driving technical innovation inÂ the hosting industry, weÂ encourage you toÂ apply. JoinÂ us inÂ building robust, scalable solutions that power the digital experience for clients across the globe.

title: Senior Python Developer (Tech Lead) [DreamHost]

description:
AtÂ Lyft, our mission isÂ toÂ improve peopleâ€™s lives with the worldâ€™s best transportation. ToÂ doÂ this, weÂ start with our own community byÂ creating anÂ open, inclusive, and diverse organization.

Lyftâ€™s engineering team isÂ expanding rapidly, and weÂ are seeking talented Software Engineers toÂ join our Pay Productivity team. Our engineers are innovative, adaptable, and passionate about tackling complex problems. They thrive inÂ anÂ environment that values organizational transparency, career growth, mentorship, and constructive feedback. Our engineers deploy code toÂ production continuously, and they depend onÂ their team toÂ enhance productivity byÂ eliminating obstacles and maintaining streamlined processes.

The mission ofÂ the Pay Productivity team atÂ Lyft isÂ toÂ provide best-in-class, reliable, transparent and cost-effective payments platform toÂ all Lyft products. The team isÂ responsible for ensuring that all Lyft productsÂ â€” Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters, Subscription etc are able toÂ cost effectively process payments, both, pay-ins and pay-outs. This means processing tens ofÂ billions ofÂ dollars inÂ customer payments and driver payouts every year. The team also builds platform capabilities toÂ support innovative payment products, some ofÂ the recent ones include Daily Billing, Lyft Cash, Lyft Direct, Subscriptions and several others. The team owns the integration with our 3rd party payment processors, co-brand partners and gift card program managers.

Responsibilities:

  • BeÂ responsible for, design, develop, deploy, monitor, operate and maintain existing orÂ new elements ofÂ our payment processing capabilities
  • Maintain, improve, and develop tooling and systems that enhance the reliability, scalability, and efficiency ofÂ our platform
  • Unblock, support and communicate with internal partners toÂ achieve results
  • Have aÂ good grasp and ability toÂ explain the various trade-offs made inÂ decisions
  • Participate inÂ our teamâ€™s on-call rotations, respond toÂ incidents, and support other teams toÂ mitigate customer-impacting events
  • Share your knowledge byÂ giving brown bags, tech talks, and promoting appropriate tech and engineering best practices
  • Help leading large projects from idea toÂ positive execution

Experience:

  • BS/MS orÂ equivalent inÂ Computer Engineering, Computer Science, orÂ related field orÂ relevant work experience
  • 4+Â years ofÂ software engineering industry experience with Go/Python/Scala/Java/.Net/etc.
  • Experience designing, debugging and running fault-tolerant, highly available, large-scale distributed systems
  • Experience working with public cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Microsoft Azure, etc.)
  • Experience working with databases, relational orÂ NoSQL
  • Write clear, scalable and clear design documentation
  • Must have aÂ track record ofÂ professional excellence

Benefits:

  • The latest technology and equipment you need.
  • 28Â calendar days for vacation and upÂ toÂ 5Â paid days off.
  • 18Â weeks ofÂ paid parental leave. Biological, adoptive and foster parents are all eligible.
  • Mental health benefits.
  • Family building benefits.

description:

Clientâ€™s core business isÂ investing inÂ companies asÂ anÂ entrepreneur.

The company isÂ the absolute pioneer inÂ subscription commerce and has been managing B2C customers inÂ subscription models inÂ its own holdings for decades.

Job specifications:

Flask:

Familiar with CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
